Text.Page: (The old book is titled "Greandale Feeding Journal #2.")

Adult Greandale, Day 73.

[Health]: Good
[Remark]: Food in cage.

My third day as apprentice, and I already got promoted to keeper! I'm getting double rations now!
My predecessor says to keep the journal a secret, even from the masters. When I'm about to retire, I should pass it off to the next keeper.Read the journal.Turn the page.

Adult Greandale, Day 75.

[Health]: Good
[Remark]: Didn't have dinner

[Keeper's journal]
Greandale might not be eating, but I'm stuffed! Double rations is worth all the extra work!
They tell me Greandale sometimes stops eating dinner, and we might have to give it special food to restore its appetite.Turn the page.

Adult Greandale 76th day.

[Health]: Good
[Remark]: Special meal.

[Keeper's journal]
Greandale's appetite seems restored. The special meal is heavy and awkward to carry by yourself, but Greandale is satisfied, so that's all that matters.
My predecessor didn't help. I think he's already left the castle.Turn the page.

Adult Greandale, Day 77.

[Health]: Good
[Remark]: None

[Keeper's journal]
Greandale seems happy. I think it likes me because I gave it that special meal yesterday.
The masters say my predecessor is indeed gone from the castle, and won't be coming back.
Too bad...I wanted to ask him what Greandale wants when he stares at you like he's been doing.Skip to the next remarks.

Adult Greandale, Day 142.

[Health]: Good
[Remark]: Left food.

My first full week as the new apprentice keeper!

[Keeper's journal]
Greandale isn't finishing its food. The journal says this happens a lot, and we might need to feed Greandale something special. Keeper seems tense.Skip to the next remarks.

Adult Greandale 148th day.

[Health]: Great
[Remark]: Special meal did the trick!

[Keeper's journal]
This stupid monster's special meal is better than what I get... The way it squirmed, it must've been a deer or something. How come I don't get fresh meat? I thought being promoted to head keeper was some kind of honor!

And where is the previous head keeper? Probably drunk again.Turn the page.

Adult Greandale 149th day.

[Health]: Great
[Remark]: As usual, feeling bad

[Keeper's journal]
Predecessor quit...?
Have to do all the work by myself? No wonder they're giving me double rations!
Wish this stupid monster would stop staring at me!Turn the page.

Damn! Damn! Damn!

This is my last record. No more journal. If you're the new keeper and you're reading this...run!
The "special meal" the monster got was actually my predecessor...and I'm the next one!
Someone came in while I was sleeping, and put me in a sack. I was able to cut a hole in the sack, and I should've guessed it: I'm in the monster's bowl.

Got to hide the journal before Greandale gets me!Turn the page.

Woke up in the monster's cage. Found this journal.
I'm not the first. These sick archdevan bastards...
If you find this journal, please tell my mother that I love her. She lives on the second floor of the third house in the 27th district. Please, plea

(Journal ends.)Close the journal.
